title: Hello World - My First Blog Post
description: Welcome to my new blog built with Next.js, MDX, and Contentlayer
author: Your Name

body.raw:
# Welcome to My Blog!

This is my first blog post using **Contentlayer** with *Next.js* and *MDX*. 

## Why I Chose This Stack

1. **Next.js** - For its amazing developer experience and performance
2. **Contentlayer** - For type-safe content management
3. **MDX** - For writing content with JSX components

## Code Example

```typescript
const greeting = 'Hello, World!';
console.log(greeting);
```

You can even use React components in your MDX files!

## What's Next?

Stay tuned for more posts about:
- Web Development
- Technology Trends
- Best Practices
- And much more!

Feel free to [contact me](/contact) if you have any questions or suggestions.
